flavor: It looked like random packet loss. It wasn't.
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, place 1 virus counter on this program. Whenever you breach R&D, choose a number less than the number of hosted virus counters. Access that many additional cards.
text:
Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, place 1 virus counter on this program.
Whenever you breach R&D, choose a number less than the number of hosted virus counters. Access that many additional cards.
title: Medium

stripped_text: Install Parasite only on a rezzed piece of ice. Host ice has -1 strength for each virus counter on Parasite and is trashed if its strength is 0 or less. When your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on Parasite.
text:
Install Parasite only on a rezzed piece of ice.
Host ice has -1 strength for each virus counter on Parasite and is trashed if its strength is 0 or less.
When your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on Parasite.
title: Parasite

flavor: CyberSolutions' e3 line of implants trade strictly in muscle memory and autonomic responses, freeing the brain to focus entirely on cerebral tasks.
stripped_text: Whenever you break a subroutine on a piece of ice, you may pay 1 credit to break 1 subroutine on that ice. Errata from FAQ 3.0.1
text:
Whenever you break a subroutine on a piece of ice, you may pay 1[credit] to break 1 subroutine on that ice.
<errata>Errata from FAQ 3.0.1</errata>
title: e3 Feedback Implants

flavor: "People keep saying that 'Cash is king' in the business, like it's untraceable in the days of DNA sniffers and microtracers. Digital credits can be just as anonymous, and they're just as easy to counterfeit." -Silhouette
stripped_text: Place 3 virus counters on Cache when it is installed. Hosted virus counter: Gain 1 credit.
text: Place 3 virus counters on Cache when it is installed. Hosted virus counter: Gain 1[credit].
title: Cache

flavor: A little corporate restructuring is necessary once in a while.
stripped_text: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, you may look at the top 5 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.
text: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, you may look at the top 5 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.
title: Indexing

flavor: "Its bytes are definitely worse than its bark." -Chaos Theory
stripped_text: When you install this program, place 4 power counters on it. Interface -> Hosted power counter: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 1click: +1 strength.
text: When you install this program, place 4 power counters on it. Interface -> Hosted power counter: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 1[click]: +1 strength.
title: Cerberus "Lady" H1

flavor: Data hunters always pay top dollar for old drives. The more useless the data, the higher the payout.
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Gain 9 credits.
text:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Gain 9[credit].
title: Lucky Find

flavor: A VoicePAD is a personal access device with most of its functions ripped out. Just about all it's good for is making voice-calls and managing your contacts. The only reason to even have one is for its anonymity, which for a certain kind of person is all the reason one needs.
stripped_text: 1 recurring credit (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 1 hosted credit.) You can spend hosted credits to play events.
text: 1[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 1 hosted credit.) You can spend hosted credits to play events.
title: Prepaid VoicePAD

flavor: NEXT Design's ice provides the discerning business with a suite of ice that creates a daunting security presence for intruders.
stripped_text: NEXT Bronze has +1 strength for each rezzed piece of NEXT ice. Subroutine End the run.
text: NEXT Bronze has +1 strength for each rezzed piece of NEXT ice. [subroutine] End the run.
title: NEXT Bronze

flavor: The networking capabilities of the NEXT suite of ice are unparalleled.
stripped_text: NEXT Silver gains "Subroutine End the run." for each rezzed piece of NEXT ice.
text: NEXT Silver gains "[subroutine] End the run." for each rezzed piece of NEXT ice.
title: NEXT Silver

flavor: "If thou only knowest what it is to conquer, and knowest not what it is to be defeated; woe unto thee…" -Tokugawa Ieyasu
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner trashes a Corp card (including Hostile Infrastructure), do 1 net damage.
text: Whenever the Runner trashes a Corp card (including Hostile Infrastructure), do 1 net damage.
title: Hostile Infrastructure

flavor: A masterpiece of cloning and hardware technology, Jinteki created homo vacuo operae, commonly called "turtlebacks", to operate for long periods of time within a vacuum.
stripped_text: Gain 1 credit whenever you create a server.
text: Gain 1[credit] whenever you create a server.
title: Turtlebacks

flavor:
"Let me get this straight. Your target market is 15-19 year old g-modded immigrants with one parent, a discretionary income over 2k a month, B+ or higher grades, an outgoing personality, and have a friend who owns a g-monkey?"
"Yes. Is that a problem?"
"No, not at all. I just don't get why your list is so short."
stripped_text: Gain 1 credit for each card in the Runner's grip.
text: Gain 1[credit] for each card in the Runner's grip.
title: Sweeps Week

flavor:
"I hear the coast is nice this time of year."
"If you're in the right business, it's nice all the year."
stripped_text: Each agenda in the root of this server gets -1 advancement requirement. Limit 1 region per server.
text: Each agenda in the root of this server gets -1 advancement requirement. Limit 1 region per server.
title: SanSan City Grid

flavor: "Do it again, but this time I want to see you to enunciate less. Maybe let some spittle fly."
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may rez a card, lowering the rez cost by 1 credit. 1 credit,trash: Search R&D for an asset, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
text:
When your turn begins, you may rez a card, lowering the rez cost by 1[credit].
1[credit],[trash]: Search R&D for an asset, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
title: Executive Boot Camp

flavor: "I'd like to remind the ladies and gentlemen of the press that several of the buildings damaged in the blast were owned by Weyland Consortium subsidiaries…"
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Do 4 meat damage.
text:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Do 4 meat damage.
title: Scorched Earth

flavor:
There drew he forth the brand Excalibur,
And o'er him, drawing it, the winter moon,
Brightening the skirts of a long cloud, ran forth
And sparkled keen with frost against the hilt:
For all the haft twinkled with diamond sparks,
Myriads of topaz-lights, and jacinth work
Of subtlest jewellery. -Lord Tennyson
stripped_text: Subroutine The Runner cannot make another run this turn.
text: [subroutine] The Runner cannot make another run this turn.
title: Excalibur

stripped_text: Gain 1 credit. The first time each turn you play a copy of Subliminal Messaging, gain click. When your turn begins, if this card is in Archives and the Runner did not initiate any runs during their last turn, you may reveal this card and add it to HQ.
text:
Gain 1[credit].
The first time each turn you play a copy of Subliminal Messaging, gain [click].
When your turn begins, if this card is in Archives and the Runner did not initiate any runs during their last turn, you may reveal this card and add it to HQ.
title: Subliminal Messaging
